===Etymology===
* '''5th – 4th century {{B.C.E.}}:''', [[w:Zuo Qiuming|Zuo Qiuming]], ''[[:zh:s:國語/秋水]]''
*: '''眾心成城'''，[[眾]][[口]][[鑠]][[金]]。
*:: The hearts of the masses can forge a stronghold; the mouths of the masses can melt gold.

# The will of the masses forge a stronghold.
